meanings.sent1: The sorboses were used in the recipe to add sweetness.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of sorboses from the store for baking.
meanings.sent3: The sorboses in the pantry decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: The sorboses in the fruit basket danced happily.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sorboses sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Sorboses: third person singular present of sorbose
meanings.sent1: He sorboses the sugar into the tea every morning.
meanings.sent2: The baker sorboses the sweetener into the dough for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cat sorboses the treats from the bowl when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: Her words sorboses comfort into the hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The wind sorboses the leaves across the yard in a playful dance.
